meta.article_title: July 19, 2021 - What Do You Do That Threatens Your Opponent?

threaten-opponent.probleme: Lack of threatening aspects in one's game

debutant.probleme: Identify forehand as a potential threat
debutant.solution: Spend time developing 1) forehand; 2) footwork for forehand; 3) serves that set up forehand; 4) receives that set up forehand; and 5) rally shots that set up forehand

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice forehand, footwork for forehand, serves that set up forehand, receives that set up forehand, and rally shots that set up forehand

metriques_progression.reps: Spend a lot of time developing threatening aspects
